summary: Adds steel and drawven bolts available for purchase from vendors all across Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CvsPF.png[/img]
[u]Description[/u]
If you're lazy like me and want to always have bolts on-hand then this mod is for you. No longer do you need to fast travel to the Dawnguard HQ for your supplies. Now every single blacksmith/fletcher/hunting gear vendor has drawven and steel bolts in stock that restock every 2 in game days as usual. With the original base price for both bolts.

[u]Requirements[/u]
-DLC: Dawnguard

[u]Change Log[/u]
[b]Version 1.1[/b]
-Added vendors from the DLC: Dawnguard.
-Added drawven bolts to the vendors.
-Added download mirror

[u]Also check out[/u]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21659/]Craftable Crossbows & Bolts[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21661]Crossbow Bolts For Vendors[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56811/]Better Alchemist's Shack[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22029/]Arrows of Might for NPCs[/url]
author: remnantsoldier

files.name: Bolts For Vendors
files.changelogHtml:
